Description.Text:
Nh Eurobuilding hotel is situated in the heart of Madrid, close to the famous Paseo de la Castellana and to the most emblematic buildings of the city (Picasso Tower, Kio Towers, Azca Center). It is at a short walking distance from the Real Madrid football stadium. Our Elysium spa is one of the main health centers of the city, and its services are based on the curative effects of water in a calm and relaxing environment. If you wish to have a relaxing aquatic experience, enjoy our swimming pool and Turkish baths. You also have the possibility to do some physical exercise in our modern fitness areas.

*NOTE* UMMER RENOVATIONS - ELYSIUM SPA & FITNESS July 1 - September 1 Please note that in the upcoming months the hotel will be renovating and improving the ELYSIUM SPA. These renovations will affect the thermal circuit, where services will not be offered in the water area: pools swimming lane, aquagym, sauna and Turkish bath. The gym (wellness area, aerobic area, free weights and classes), paddle courts, beauty and massage cabins, solarium and tanning booths will remain open. The hotel apologizes for any inconveniences this may cause. FREE WIFI in Lobby & Rooms

Nh Eurobuilding hotel is situated in the heart of Madrid, close to the famous Paseo de la Castellana and to the most emblematic buildings of the city (Picasso Tower, Kio Towers, Azca Center). It is at a short walking distance from the Real Madrid football stadium.

Club room - Complementing the modernity and comfortability of our Premium and Superior rooms, our guests can enjoy Nh Eurobuilding "U.nique" Service, providing an unforgettable experience. The added values included at no cost are Buffet Breakfast in a reserved area, free High Speed Wireless Internet Access and international calls, SPA & FITNESS Elysium access, minibar (no alcohol, per stay), Letter of "Luv", washing and ironing (2 pieces per stay - Hours: 7:00 a.m. to 24.00pm), Newspaper (Nac & Inter), shoe cleaning, hospitality "U.nique" Check in priority and Concierge Service, Early Check-in (subject to availability) and Late check out (18.00 hrs).
Standard Room - Large, comfortable and bright 30m2 rooms equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi Internet access, air conditioning, bathrom kit, minibar, and safe. Rest comfortably with custom pillows and a luxurious bed in your cozy room. Available in King, Twin and Queen size beds, as well as rooms for handicapped (all subject to availability).
Superior Room - Superior Rooms offer 40m2 of elegant decor and high brightness. Enjoy satellite TV, free Wi-Fi Internet access), air conditioning, minibar, bathrobe and slippers, safe, stereo, coffee maker / kettle and a private balcony with great views of Madrid. Available in King, Twin and Queen size beds, as well as rooms for handicapped (all subject to availability).
Premium Room - In addition to the features and services of the deluxe room, enjoy a magnificent room of 40 m2 with outside corner terraces, designed for maximum comfort of our clients, with a expecional decoration and even one of them categorized as Helath room for their sports equipment PREMIUM welcome gift, daily newspaper free in bedroom. Club service is available. Free Wi-Fi Internet.
Deluxe Room - Large exterior room with sophisticated design, high brightness and wooden floor located in the most modern part of the hotel. Soundproofing and individual air conditioning. All rooms have LCD 32 " screens with more than 30 national and international channels and radio stations. In these rooms our clients have free WiFi. The complement nesspreso coffee, electronic minibar and safe with laptop capacity Large bathroom with dressing area, shower with rainshower, bathrobe and slippers, magnifying mirror and amenities "club". A DELUXE welcome gift. Club service available. Free Wi-Fi Internet.
Deluxe Club - Large exterior room with sophisticated design, high brightness and wooden floor located in the most modern part of the hotel. Soundproofing, individual air conditioning, LCD 32 "screens and free WiFi. Available in King, Twin and Queen size beds, (all subject to availability). Includes UNIQUE SERVICE: you would enjoy free Buffet Breakfast Antiox in a quiet area, Free High Speed Wireless Internet Access and international phone calls, Access to SPA & FITNESS Elysium, free newspaper, minibar (no alcohol, per stay), Letter of "Luv", washing and ironing (2 pieces per stay - Hours: 7:00 a.m. to 24.00pm), Newspaper, shoe cleaning, hospitality "U.nique". In addition, Unique service includes Check in priority and Concierge Service, Early Check-in (subject to availability), Late check out(18.00 hrs)
Premium Club - In addition to the features and services of the deluxe room, enjoy a magnificent room of 40 m2 with outside corner terraces, designed for maximum comfort of our clients, with an exceptional decoration and even one of them categorized as Health room for their sports equipment. PREMIUM welcome gift, daily newspaper free in bedroom. Club service is available. Includes UNIQUE SERVICE: you would enjoy free Buffet Breakfast Antiox in a quiet area, Free High Speed Wireless Internet Access and international phone calls, Access to SPA & FITNESS Elysium, free newspaper, minibar (no alcohol, per stay), Letter of "Luv", washing and ironing (2 pieces per stay - Hours: 7:00 a.m. to 24.00pm), Newspaper (Nac & Inter), shoe cleaning, hospitality "U.nique". In addition, Unique service includes Check in priority and Concierge Service, Early Check-in (subject to availability), Late check out (18.00 hrs).
